Package utility.geometry

Class FloatMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • utility.geometry.FloatMatrix
  • public class FloatMatrix
extends Object
    A Matrix with double values.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private double[][] values  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      FloatMatrix​(int width, int height)
      Generates a new 2d matrix with the given dimensions.
      FloatMatrix​(int width, int height, double initialValue)
      Generates a new 2d matrix with the given dimensions and a default value for each element.
      FloatMatrix​(FloatMatrix sourceMatrix)
      Copy Constructor for duplicating the FloatMatrix by duplicating each value.
